// eslint-disable-next-line import/prefer-default-export
export var sortCoins=function sortCoins(sortName,coins){var array=coins.slice();switch(sortName){case'name':return array.sort(function(a,b){var nameA=a.name.toUpperCase();var nameB=b.name.toUpperCase();if(nameA<nameB){return-1;}if(nameA>nameB){return 1;}return 0;});case'price':return array.sort(function(a,b){return a.priceUsd-b.priceUsd;});default:return array;}};
